description: The Aerogators` combat mother ship. It`s a very large ship, with it`s total length being equal to the Hagane`s. It stores many Megillot all along its sides. It`s hard to find since it is equipped with a special space navigation device that hides its position. The serial number given to it from the Earth Forces is AGX-04, and its recognition code is "Flower."
name: AGX-04 Fuleh
